text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea laevis is a botanical species belonging to the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Burma,  Thailand, Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Borneo.
text.References: Ashton, P. 1998.  Shorea laevis.   2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
